body_html: It is actually feasible for PyTorch. By the time the user wants to compute the gradients, the dynamic graph has already been constructed, at which time the dependency information can be inferred from the graph. PyTorch cannot automatically infer what tensors not to compute during forward pass, but it certainly can during backward pass.

body: It is actually feasible for PyTorch. By the time the user wants to compute the gradients, the dynamic graph has already been constructed, at which time the dependency information can be inferred from the graph. PyTorch cannot automatically infer what tensors not to compute during forward pass, but it certainly can during backward pass.
